Name: Name Change, David Michael Ruddle Street, Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to renaming a street David Michael Ruddle Street, in the Borough of the Bronx.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Parks and Recreation
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1. The following street name, in the Borough of the Bronx, is hereby renamed as follows:

New Name	Present Name	Limits	
David Michael Ruddle Street	West 234 Street	between Bailey Avenue and Broadway	

Â§2. This local law shall take effect immediately upon its enactment into law.

THC - 12/1/04
